tweets.text: Vegetation clearance starts from tomorrow. A very short visit this am incl: nest building Whitethroat, territorial Cetti's/Reed Warbler & Reed Bunting. Video shows how farcical this is! Still time to see sense @EnvAgency @kiergroup @Natures_Voice @Bucktonbirder  PLEASE RETWEET https://t.co/Tve0B6o4va

We‚Äôve had to drive out to the country desperate for oxygen. It‚Äôs a living nightmare. Never thought I‚Äôd be driven out of my home town. It‚Äôs an environmental disaster @BorisJohnson @MattHancock @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency urgent action required NOW, we can‚Äôt breathe.#stopthestink https://t.co/rlWdyu4V0M

tweets.text: I don't usually do this sort of thing, but when it is on my local patch it really gets to me!! Scrub & tree removal in May is terrible practice. Please retweet. https://t.co/cYEIymHH0K Two videos showing the area & my concerns. @DevonWildlife @Natures_Voice @EnvAgency @kiergroup https://t.co/U8doUyBP5K

This week, we‚Äôve visited #WalleysQuarry to assess @RedIndustries2 progress on the required capping works. 

We expect Red Industries to complete that work today. 

See our webpage for further updates and air quality information. https://t.co/6B9i1x2fA0

#NewcastleUnderLyme https://t.co/GengkU8LDM
Why aren‚Äôt you taking our suffering seriously, what will it take? Wealth should not be put before health @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids #stopthestink @AaronBell4NUL @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off

The last time the toxic fumes were this bad the @EnvAgency "forgot" to switch the monitoring equipment on. This time the ics email has stopped working. @EnvAgency Too many coincidences, @BorisJohnson @AaronBell4NUL What the hell is going on at @EnvAgency!

tweets.text:
The @EnvAgency calculate that Affinity Water are over abstracting local chalk streams to the tune of about 430 million litres of water per day.

That's almost 10% of the world's total supply of chalk streams degraded for profit.

Let's talk about a clean conscience shall we. https://t.co/J8nQmVNWlv

Out #fishing this Bank Holiday? 

Our enforcement officers are out & about, like here at Eccleshall #Staffs.

Please remember it is coarse close season. Check where to fish: https://t.co/S2H6nvUW9o

Buy a licence at https://t.co/u1oT1jpPg6 https://t.co/wCKAvGPM5S

urls.title: Petition: Review the Regulation of Odour Management of Landfill Sites
urls.description: We call for the Government to review how the Environment Agency monitors and manages levels of malodourous gasses. Consideration should be given to compulsory monitoring of emissions of landfill sites and for the EA to be obliged to act with urgency when high levels of odour complaints are received.

4 mths ago the Stink visited us for the 1st time. 3 mths ago I rang @EnvAgency angry that I couldnt open windows at night. 2 mths ago my calls were about solid walls of gas outside my home. 1 mth ago calls to @EnvAgency were about smarting eyes, headaches, AND NOW I JUST WEEP.
